reviewText: The third season comes in 2 volumes:Volume 1 contains 3 discs:DISC ONESurprise- Zoey walks in on Chase with his new girlfriend RebeccaChase's Girlfriend- Rebecca tells Zoey to stay away from ChaseHot Dean- Zoey and her friends set their dorm adviser, Coco, up on a date with the new deanZoey's Tutor- Zoey secretly has Logan tutor her in chemistryThe Great Vince Blake- Chase finds out that PCA's football star plans to cheat on their next testDISC TWOSilver Hammer Society- Zoey and her friends want to be admitted to PCA's secret societyMichael Loves Lisa- Michael has a crush on classmate Lisa, who already has a boyfriendWrestling- Zoey is forced to join the school's wrestling teamZoey's Balloon- Someone blackmails Zoey when they find out Zoey's most embarrassing secretChase's Grandma- Zoey invites Chase's grandma to PCA to celebrate their birthdaysDISC THREEQuarantine- Zoey and her friends are forced to stay in their dorm room after Quinn releases a deadly germ in their roomThe Radio- Zoey and Chase argue over an old, very valuable radio that was given to Chase by his grandfatherPaige At PCA- A new science whiz, Paige (played by Miranda Cosgrove), comes to PCA and bests Quinn at scienceDance Contest- Zoey needs a partner for PCA's dance contestThe Favor Chain- Zoey wants to meet her favorite author at the bookstore, but must complete a series of tasks in order to get Coco to drive herNo bonus featuresVolume 2 contains the last 2 discs:DISC FOURZoey's Ribs- PCA holds a rib cookoffThe Curse of PCA (Double length episode)- Zoey and her friends are cursed after they disturb a former student's resting placeDrippin'- Logan's cell phone keeps setting off the fire alarm; Michael attempts to start a new catchwordSon of A Dean- Zoey begins dating the dean's sonDISC FIVEHands On A Blix Van- PCA holds a contest to see who can keep their hands on a Blix van the longestMiss PCA- Logan hosts PCA's first ever beauty pageantLogan Gets Cut Off- After Logan's father cuts off his financial resources, he must learn how to fend for himselfGoodbye Zoey? (Double length episode)- Zoey's parents are moving to England and Zoey must decide if she wants to transfer to another boarding schoolNo bonus featuresSome reviews have said the Season 4 finale PCA Confidential is on this disc, but on my version it's not. That may only be on the Canadian version of the disc. It will also only play in Region 1 DVD players. I own a Sony and it plays just fine, everything came in the right boxes and all the discs are in brand new condition. Got the full set for $18 which is a really good price for 2 volumes of 25 episodes. And in my opinion Season 3 is one of the strongest seasons of Zoey, lots of great episodes and you're getting more bang for your buck. Only problem I have is no special features and no PCA Confidential episode.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I ordered this Zoey 1010 complete season 3 set. the write up says it comes with 5 discs. But there are only 3 discs in the box.  I see the review states it should come in TWO boxes, and maybe I am missing a box? I  returned the box, and  now re-ordered ,  hoping to get BOTH boxes for this complete season 3 set.  Wish me luck!

reviewText: I love Zoey 101 and season 3 and 4 are my fave seasons and by far the best ones. This season showed the girls friendship with Quinn moving in with Zoey and Lola, it was really evident that Logan, chase, and Michael were friends more so in this season even though they bickered and razzed each other , no one could dispute the friendship between them . All in all and without analyzing every episode this is a must have dvd , awesome episodes and reasonable price. Came fast and am very happy with it .

reviewerName: Reconnecting To My Childhood "Time Won't Let ...
reviewText: This Amazon produced Made On Demand DVD-R season set contains the complete third season of Zoey 101. While I find the price to be ridiculous I thought I'd list the 24 episodes that this set will contain for those who are curious.26  Surprise27  Chase's Girlfriend28  Hot Dean29  Zoey's Tutor30  The Great Vince Blake31  Silver Hammer Society32  Michael Loves Lisa33  Wrestling34  Zoey's Balloon35  Chase's Grandma36  Quarantine37  The Radio38  Paige at PCA39  The Dance Contest40  Favor Chain41  Zoey's Ribs42  Curse of PCA43  Drippin44  Son of a Dean45  Hands On a Blix Van46  Miss PCA47  Logan Gets Cut Off48  Goodbye Zoey Part One49  Goodbye Zoey Part TwoOf those episodes the only ones that truly stand out storywise are Surprise, Chase's Girlfriend, Chase's Grandma (which was really good) and Goodbye Zoey I & II. The reason this got only one star when I first rated it was because this season is weaker than others and while containing more episodes it was listed at a very high price for something that isn't even an 'official' set. I wrote that though when the set was listed at 65.99 and I'm now glad to give the set 5 stars for fans and 3 stars for anyone else since the price has lowered. Thanks For Your Time, Hope This Helped.
